# init(device:a:b:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a linear neuron filter.

## Declaration

```swift
init(device: any MTLDevice, a: Float, b: Float)
```

## Parameters

- **device**: The device the filter will run on.
- **a**: The “a” variable of the filter function.
- **b**: The “b” variable of the filter function.

## Return Value

A valid [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSCNNNeuronLinear] object or `nil`, if failure.
